source_tafsir: Aplikasi Quran Kementrian Agama Republik Indonesia

1.text_tafsir_en: In this verse, God asks the Prophet Muhammad, "Do you know those who reject religion and what those who reject religion?" This question is answered in the following paragraphs.
1.text_tafsir: Dalam ayat ini, Allah menghadapkan pertanyaan kepada Nabi Muhammad, "Apakah engkau mengetahui orang yang mendustakan agama dan yang dimaksud dengan orang yang mendustakan agama?" Pertanyaan ini dijawab pada ayat-ayat berikut.
1.text_translation_en: HAST THOU ever considered [the kind of man] who gives the lie to all moral law?

2.text_tafsir_en: Allah then explained that some of the characteristics of people who reject religion are those who reject and shout at orphans who come to him to ask for his mercy for the necessities of his life. His rejection was an insult and arrogance against the orphans.
2.text_tafsir: Allah lalu menjelaskan bahwa sebagian dari sifat-sifat orang yang mendustakan agama ialah orang-orang yang menolak dan membentak anak-anak yatim yang datang kepadanya untuk memohon belas-kasihnya demi kebutuhan hidupnya. Penolakannya itu sebagai penghinaan dan takabur terhadap anak-anak yatim itu.
2.text_translation: Maka itulah orang yang menghardik anak yatim,
2.text_translation_en: Behold, it is this [kind of man] that thrusts the orphan away,

3.text_tafsir_en: God further emphasizes the nature of the liar, that is, he does not ask others to help and feed the poor. Not wanting to invite people to feed and help the poor means he didn't do it at all. Based on the above information, if one is not willing to help the poor then he should encourage others to do such a noble work.
3.text_tafsir: Allah menegaskan lebih lanjut sifat pendusta itu, yaitu dia tidak mengajak orang lain untuk membantu dan memberi makan orang miskin. Bila tidak mau mengajak orang memberi makan dan membantu orang miskin berarti ia tidak melakukannya sama sekali. Berdasarkan keterangan di atas, bila seorang tidak sanggup membantu orang-orang miskin maka hendaklah ia menganjurkan orang lain agar melakukan usaha yang mulia itu.
3.text_translation: dan tidak mendorong memberi makan orang miskin.
3.text_translation_en: and feels no urge to feed the needy.

4.text_tafsir_en: In these verses, God expresses a threat that woe to those who perform their prayers with their bodies and tongues, not in their hearts. He was ignorant and unaware of what his tongue said and what his limbs were doing. She bent down and bowed in disgust, she uttered the interpretation but did not realize what she was saying. All of these are just ordinary gestures and mere memorized words that do not affect anything, do not change like a robot. Such behavior is directed at those who reject religion, namely hypocrites. The threat was not directed at the Muslim public, who did not understand Arabic, and did not know the meaning of what he was reading. So the common people who do not understand the meaning of what they read in the prayers do not include those who are neglected as mentioned in this verse.
4.text_tafsir:
Dalam ayat-ayat ini, Allah mengungkapkan satu ancaman yaitu celakalah orang-orang yang mengerjakan salat dengan tubuh dan lidahnya, tidak sampai ke hatinya. Dia lalai dan tidak menyadari apa yang diucapkan lidahnya dan yang dikerjakan oleh anggota tubuhnya. Ia rukuk dan sujud dalam keadaan lalai, ia mengucapkan takbir tetapi tidak menyadari apa yang diucapkannya. Semua itu adalah hanya gerak biasa dan kata-kata hafalan semata-mata yang tidak mempengaruhi apa-apa, tidak ubahnya seperti robot.

Perilaku tersebut ditujukan kepada orang-orang yang mendustakan agama, yaitu orang munafik. Ancaman itu tidak ditujukan kepada orang-orang muslim yang awam, tidak mengerti bahasa Arab, dan tidak tahu tentang arti dari apa yang dibacanya. Jadi orang-orang awam yang tidak memahami makna dari apa yang dibacanya dalam salat tidak termasuk orang-orang yang lalai seperti yang disebut dalam ayat ini.
4.text_translation_en: Woe, then, unto those praying ones

5.text_tafsir_en: In these verses, God expresses a threat that woe to those who perform their prayers with their bodies and tongues, not in their hearts. He was ignorant and unaware of what his tongue said and what his limbs were doing. She bent down and bowed in disgust, she uttered the interpretation but did not realize what she was saying. All of these are just ordinary gestures and mere memorized words that do not affect anything, do not change like a robot. Such behavior is directed at those who reject religion, namely hypocrites. The threat was not directed at the Muslim public, who did not understand Arabic, and did not know the meaning of what he was reading. So the common people who do not understand the meaning of what they read in the prayers do not include those who are neglected as mentioned in this verse.

5.text_translation_en: whose hearts from their prayer are remote

6.text_tafsir_en: Allah then adds an explanation of the nature of religious liars, that is, they carry out acts of birth merely because they are happy, not impressed by their souls to absorb their secrets and wisdom.
6.text_tafsir: Allah selanjutnya menambah penjelasan tentang sifat orang pendusta agama, yaitu mereka melakukan perbuatan-perbuatan lahir hanya semata karena ria, tidak terkesan pada jiwanya untuk meresapi rahasia dan hikmahnya.
6.text_translation_en: those who want only to be seen and praised,

7.text_tafsir_en: God added in this verse the nature of liars, that is, they do not want to provide the goods needed by those who need them, but they are not to be kept, such as pots, cups, bowls, and so on. The state of the people who raised the religion differs from the situation of the one who rejected the religion, as the first one appears in their conduct of honesty, justice, love, generosity, and so on. Whereas religious liars are rude, cheating, evil, arrogant, stubborn, looking down on others, they do not care about anyone but themselves, are proud of their wealth and position, and do not want to give away any of their wealth, either for the sake of their individual or community.
7.text_tafsir:
Allah menambahkan lagi dalam ayat ini sifat pendusta itu, yaitu mereka tidak mau memberikan barang-barang yang diperlukan oleh orang-orang yang membutuhkannya, sedang barang itu tak pantas ditahan, seperti periuk, kapuk, cangkul, dan lain-lain. 

Keadaan orang yang membesarkan agama berbeda dengan keadaan orang yang mendustakan agama, karena yang pertama tampak dalam tata hidupnya yang jujur, adil, kasih sayang, pemurah, dan lain-lain. Sedangkan sifat pendusta agama ialah ria, curang, aniaya, takabur, kikir, memandang rendah orang lain, tidak mementingkan yang lain kecuali dirinya sendiri, bangga dengan harta dan kedudukan, serta tidak mau mengeluarkan sebahagian dari hartanya, baik untuk keperluan perseorangan maupun untuk masyarakat.
7.text_translation_en: and, withal, deny all assistance [to their fellow-men]!
